data.title: Attendance Zones
data.text:
Attendance Zone Maps

The maps below were created to be viewed in Adobe Acrobat PDF format. If you do not have the Acrobat viewer installed, please visit http://www.adobe.com to download the FREE software for your web browser. These maps are to be used for general information purposes only.

School attendance zone data is accurate as of this date. Posted maps, bus routes, and attendance zone information found here does not preclude any future changes. Please do not make a future home purchasing decision solely based on this information.

Contact the Cobb County School District Transportation Department or visit our Online School and Bus Locator to determine bus routes for your child.

Adobe Acrobat tips:

When viewing the maps, it is possible to "zoom" in and out for any area on the map. This will improve the quality of the picture. his can be done by:

Clicking on the magnifying glass symbol (zoom tool) on the tool bar, and

Drawing a rectangle around a specific area while holding down the mouse button, or

By changing the % item on the tool bar.
